channel.title: Best Game Console of 2007
channel.description:
[size=20pt]~[/size][size=20pt]Best Gameconsole of 2007[/size] [size=20pt]~[/size]
Well its just for the fun but ok u cant earn anything but vote ! :) Most people like The Ps3 or xbox360 but now we will see what it realy is :)
If i forgot to post some consoles then post it like this
[b] GameConsole : GameConsole here[/b] [b] Picture : U dont have to but it will be cool :)[/b]
[code][b] GameConsole : [/b] [b] Picture : [/b][/code]
Well i hope u guys dont spam ect cuz we hate it ..
"So Please Vote "
~Svenimen S~

item.title: Best Game Console of 2007
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

It’s a hard choice.
I mean the Wii has it’s ups and down.
So does the playstation 3
Also the x-box 360.
But hardware choices.X-Box 360 all teh way.
Controller.The Wii hands down.It’s a awesome way to incorporate what any game console needs.
disk storage.Playstation 3 with it’s Blu Ray disk with 60gb storage comes out on top.
So basically it comes out to what type of Fan-Boy are you?

Read full topic
